pages.text: When you begin to read the unilogs, you will see that we include photographs of the described universe. But how we manage to do that ? Simply put, as objects are transferred from an universe into another, we are simply sending a camera into the targeted universe. Hopefully, the camera comes back, but it is not always the case...
The connection quality to an universe can vary depending on multiple factors. If the quality is low, we basically just lost another camera. So if you see a unilog without photographs, you know why.
